Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.GameLogicHandlers

Class MainMenuHandler

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.GameLogicHandlers.MainMenuHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseSaveLoadSubscriber
public class MainMenuHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseSaveLoadSubscriber
MainMenuHandler is Controller Design Pattern to achieve MVVM Design on main menu actions.
Author:
Kaan Turkmen

      public void loadGame​(Player player)

    • gameMapResponseArrived

      public void gameMapResponseArrived​(java.lang.Integer databaseResponse, GameMap gameMap)
      A method for Observer Design Pattern to be called by the database when results are arrived.
      Specified by:
      gameMapResponseArrived in interface DatabaseSaveLoadSubscriber
      Parameters:
      databaseResponse - Database response indicating the operation's success or failure.
      gameMap - GameMap instance from the database.
